name: Abyss Lector: Violet Lightning
desc:
Abyss Lector: Violet Lightning

Praise be unto the Abyss, the Wisdom of Corrosion.

value.name: Chain Lightning Cascade
value.desc:
Abyss Lector: Chain Lightning Cascade

"Their violent lightning strikes the hearts of unbelievers with dark wisdom, warped by the shadowy depths of an eternal night, its violet glow proclaiming the existence of a great power that corrodes human intellect."

value.text: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with the Abyss Lector: Violet Lightning

value.name: Abyss Lector: Violet Lightning
value.desc:
A monster who serves the Abyss Order and commands lightning while singing the praises of the darkness.
These are the evangelists and the scholars of the Abyss. Their violent lightning strikes the hearts of unbelievers with dark wisdom, warped by the shadowy depths of an eternal night, its violet glow proclaiming the existence of a great power that corrodes human intellect.

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
Deals 3 <color=#ffacff>Electro DMG</color> .
If the target is already affected by Electro, steal 1 Energy from them. (If this character's Energy is already full, then the stolen Energy will be given to the next character who does not have full Energy)

<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
Deals 3 <color=#ffacff>Electro DMG</color> .
If the target has no more than 1 Energy, deals +2 DMG.

<color=#ffd780>Passive Skill</color>
(Passive) When the battle begins, this character gains Electric Rebirth.
<color=#ece5d8>Electric Rebirth</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>When the character to which this is attached would be defeated:</color> Remove this effect, ensure the character gains <color=#ffffff>Immunity to Defeat</color> , and heals them to 4 HP. After this effect is triggered, this character deals +1 <color=#ffacff>Electro DMG</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Immunity to Defeat</color>
Certain effects will grant characters an <color=#ffffff>immunity to being defeated</color> when their HP hits 0, and will heal them for a certain amount thereafter.
When this occurs, characters will not be regarded as having experienced a <color=#ffffff>defeat</color> . (Hence, their attached equipment and statuses will not be removed, and their Energy will remain uncleared.)

Applies Electro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Overloaded</color> : DMG +2 for this instance, the target is forcibly switched to the next character
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Superconduct</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Electro-Charged</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Quicken</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Catalyzing Field</color> ] that grants +1 DMG to the next 2 instances of Dendro or Electro DMG

<color=#ece5d8>Energy</color>
Characters must consume Energy to use their Elemental Bursts.
When characters use an Elemental Skill or a Normal Attack, they will gain 1 Energy.

customize.name: Abyss Lector: Violet Lightning
customize.desc:
Abyss Lector: Violet Lightning

Praise be unto the Abyss, the Wisdom of Corrosion.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text: Tavern Challenge: Friendly Fracas - Abyss Lector's Electric Surge

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow." "As you know, even the slightest amount of Electro can cause a cat's fur to stand on end, nevermind the amount of Electro Elemental power needed to battle..."
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: "Abyss Lector: Violet Lightning" starts with the Talent Card "Chain Lightning Cascade" equipped; after triggering "Electric Rebirth", it attaches "Thunderous Ward" to itself.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.text: Tavern Challenge: Serious Showdown - Abyss Lector's Jolting Thunder

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow..." "Beneath the abyssal depths, legends say that in the pitch-blackness lives a huge purple monster, and the amount of Electro on its body can cause cats to flee in fear even from hundreds of paces away..."
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: "Abyss Lector: Violet Lightning" starts with the Talent Card "Chain Lightning Cascade" equipped; after triggering "Electric Rebirth", it attaches "Thunderous Ward" to itself. "Abyss Herald: Wicked Torrents" starts with the Talent Card "Surging Undercurrent" equipped. After triggering "Watery Rebirth," they will gain a "Surging Ward."</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.desc:

The world shall be severed, and all shall be obliterated.

Complete 3 challenge objective(s) in Abyss Lector's Electric Surge
